info.title: To navigate to the pull requests for a project

procedure.step:
&CAWS-console-signin;
Make sure that you are navigating the project where you want to create or work with pull requests.

step.para: In the side navigation menu, choose Code, and then choose Pull requests.
Choose the pull request from the list of pull requests for the project. To create a pull request, choose Create pull request.

tip.para: You can filter the list of pull requests by typing part of its name in the filter bar.
